_header: The Book of Kings tells us
_description: Giezi and Naaman: Narratio in the Northern Homily Cycle — couplets

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
The buke of kynges telles vsþat the prophett
                    Eliseus…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…þer Ioy & blys ys ay lastyngNow swett ihesus vs
                    þedder bryng

BodAsh42.First Lines:
þE boke of kinges tellis vsHow þe prophete
                    helyseus…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde ihesu vs þidir spedeffor his mercye &
                    þider vs lede . Amen

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Þe bok of kynges telleþ vsHou þe prophete
                    Helyseus…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Vre lord Ihesu crist vs spedeTo do penaunce and þider vs
                    lede. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Þat spiritualte scholde not be sold (f. 176va)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und

         57 (1877): 241-316: 253.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
þe boke of kynges telles vsHowe þe prophete
                    Eliseus…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Yore myrth & ioy is ay lastyngSwete ihesu you þedire
                    vs bryng

CULDd11.First Lines:
Þe bok of kingis telliþ vshow þe prophete
                    heliseus…
CULDd11.Last Lines: …And þat it may so benseyth alle Amen Amen
CULDd11.Note:
Break between 4714 and
                    5223 occurs ten lines earlier in this MS, ‘For
                    Gieȝi & al his kynde / as we in þe boke of kingis
                    fynde’.

The buke of kynges telles vsHow þe prophet
                    helyseus…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Our lorde ihesu cryst vs spedeTo do penaunce and þither

EDCPCM.First Lines:
þe boc of kinges tellis usHou þe prophet
                    heliseus…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…Our lauerd iesu crist us spedeTo do penanz and þider us
                    lede

MinULZ822.First Lines:
þis bokes of kynges tellys vshow þe prophite
                    Elyseus…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…oure lorde Ihesu criste vs spedeTo do penaunce &
                    þider vs lede

HunHM129.First Lines:
Þe bok of kyngys tellyth vsHow þe prophet
                    eleseus…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Oure loueryd ihesu crist vs spedePenauns to do &
                    þyddyr vs led
HunHM129.Note:
No indication of new text at beginning; MS treats this as if part of
                        4714.
